languages.text: "Мой вид знает то, что тебе недоступно — искупление. И то, что мертвым не исправить своих ошибок".

traits.locale_text: "Мой вид знает то, что тебе недоступно — искупление. И то, что мертвым не исправить своих ошибок".

languages.text: "My species knows of something that will forever lie beyond your grasp — redemption. As we know the dead can never make amends."
languages.original_text: "Мой вид знает то, что тебе недоступно — искупление. И то, что мертвым не исправить своих ошибок".

traits.locale_text: "My species knows of something that will forever lie beyond your grasp — redemption. As we know that the dead can never make amends."
"My species knows of something that will forever lie beyond your grasp — redemption. As we know that the dead can never make amends."
"My species knows of something that will forever lie beyond your grasp — redemption. As we know the dead can never make amends."
"My species knows of something that will forever lie beyond your grasp — redemption. As we know the dead can never make amends."
"My species knows of something that will forever lie beyond your grasp — redemption. As we know the dead can never make amends."
"My species knows of something that will forever lie beyond your grasp — redemption. As we know the dead can never make amends."

languages.text: 「我が種族は、お前たちには永遠に手の届かぬものを知っている―それは贖いだ。死者には、決して償いなどできないのだから」
languages.original_text: "My species knows of something that will forever lie beyond your grasp — redemption. As we know the dead can never make amends."

traits.locale_text: 「我が種族は、お前たちには永遠に手の届かぬものを知っている―それは贖いだ。死者には、決して償いなどできないのだから」

languages.text: "Meine Spezies weiß von etwas, was für Euch ewig unerreichbar bleiben wird — Erlösung. Denn wir wissen, dass die Toten niemals Wiedergutmachung leisten können."
languages.original_text: "My species knows of something that will forever lie beyond your grasp — redemption. As we know the dead can never make amends."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Spezies weiß von etwas, was für Euch ewig unerreichbar bleiben wird — Erlösung. Denn wir wissen, dass die Toten niemals Wiedergutmachung leisten können."

languages.text: « Mon espèce est attachée à une autre notion qui, elle, restera à jamais hors de votre portée : celle de rédemption, car nous savons que les morts ne peuvent pas se racheter. »
languages.original_text: "My species knows of something that will forever lie beyond your grasp — redemption. As we know the dead can never make amends."

traits.locale_text: « Mon espèce est attachée à une autre notion qui, elle, restera à jamais hors de votre portée : celle de rédemption, car nous savons que les morts ne peuvent pas se racheter. »

languages.text: «Mi especie sabe de algo que jamás estará a vuestro alcance: redención. Y también sabemos que los muertos no pueden enmendar sus errores».
languages.original_text: "My species knows of something that will forever lie beyond your grasp — redemption. As we know the dead can never make amends."

traits.locale_text: «Mi especie sabe de algo que jamás estará a vuestro alcance: redención. Y también sabemos que los muertos no pueden enmendar sus errores».

languages.text: “我的种族懂得你们永远都无法理解的东西，那就是救赎。我们都很清楚，死者永远无法弥补自己犯下的过错。”
languages.original_text: "My species knows of something that will forever lie beyond your grasp — redemption. As we know the dead can never make amends."

traits.locale_text: “我的种族懂得你们永远都无法理解的东西，那就是救赎。我们都很清楚，死者永远无法弥补自己犯下的过错。”

languages.text: "Türüm; asla idrak edemeyeceğin bir şeyi, intikam arzusunu iyi bilir. Ölüler ant içemez, sen de farkındasın."
languages.original_text: "My species knows of something that will forever lie beyond your grasp — redemption. As we know the dead can never make amends."

traits.locale_text: "Türüm asla idrak edemeyeceğin bir şeyi, intikam arzusunu iyi bilir. Ölüler ant içemez, sen de farkındasın."

languages.original_text: "My species knows of something that will forever lie beyond your grasp — redemption. As we know the dead can never make amends."
